fields.label: bd2
fields.options:
As part of the Hi five community services induction program, you are required to know and understand the policies and procedures that direct your performance. Please complete the following checklist, and return it to your supervisor.

Please note: Other policies, procedures, and documents may be relevant to your role. This is not an exhaustive list.
